channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services for Multiplatforms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services for Multiplatforms

item.title: CVE-2022-43875|2024-08-03T13:40:06.719Z -- ibm -- financial%20transaction%20manager%20for%20swift%20services%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services for Multiplatforms 3.2.4 could allow an authenticated user to lock additional RM authorizations, resulting in a denial of service on displaying or managing these authorizations. IBM X-Force ID: 240034.
